name: Dalirium
description:
A tribute to the work of Salvador Dalí.

This piece celebrates the master of Surrealism himself and references timeless works such as 'The Persistence of Memory', 'Metamorphosis of Narcissus', and the unforgettable scene from 'Un Chien Andalou' by Dalí and Luis Buñuel.

Artwork information:
128x128 pixels, 637 frame loop, 30fps, 2021.
